Articles.Content:
Came about as an idea while researching Robert Goddard and his first attempts at liquid fueled motors. He placed the motor in front of the fuel tanks. Wanted to see if he was on to something.

I think I now know why von Braun didn\'t follow in his direct footsteps.

RRs

effective or not,that thing is freaking awesome 8)

makes me want to scream STAR WARS LANDSPEEDER!!!
